deprecated_configure_service.title: The counter configure service is being removed

confirm.title: [%key:component::counter::issues::deprecated_configure_service::title%]
confirm.description:
The counter service `counter.configure` is being removed and use of it has been detected. If you want to change the current value of a counter, use the new `counter.set_value` service instead.

Please remove this service from your automations and scripts and select **submit** to close this issue.

value.name: Value
value.description: The new counter value the entity should be set to.
